alert.note: Alert for Tusas Mountains Including Chama (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 3:23PM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches except between 6 and 18 inches above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph creating areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel is discouraged. Many road closures are likely. Avoid traveling if possible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
